system
Class Successor

java.lang.Object
  system.Successor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Successor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

The multithreading design implemented by this class is that of the Cilk runtime. Please read the architecture of Cilk to understand the class better. This class represents a Successor node in the DAG generated in the Cilk runtime during the execution of a Multithreaded program.

Author:
Manasa Chandrasekhar, Kowshik Prakasam

Nested Class Summary
 class Successor.Closure
          Closure used to store the missing arguments in Continuation-passing style of programming used in Cilk.
static class Successor.Status
          Status of this successor thread
